verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:1
verses.text: This is a true saying, If a man desire the office of a bishop, he desireth a good work.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:2
verses.text: A bishop then must be blameless, the husband of one wife, vigilant, sober, of good behaviour, given to hospitality, apt to teach;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:3
verses.text: Not given to wine, no striker, not greedy of filthy lucre; but patient, not a brawler, not covetous;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:4
verses.text: One that ruleth well his own house, having his children in subjection with all gravity;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 3:5
verses.text: (For if a man know not how to rule his own house, how shall he take care of the church of God?)
